episode_event_general_christmas_2019_2nd:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Did you have a
good time at my party?

I actually have another little surprise for you.
A kind of...after party, you could say!
Can you guess what it is?

Surprise! It’s a special Pokémon battle—one that
I put all my love and joy into!

Siebold and Delibird have taught me all about
hospitality and taking care of others. It’s time for
me to take care of you through a Pokémon battle!

I mean, I’ve been wanting to battle against
you again for a while now... This gives me
the perfect excuse! Tee-hee!

I’ll go get everything ready for us, OK?
Meet up with you later!
